verbose_text: Immunolabeling of Iba-1, a common marker for microglia and infiltrating monocytes, revealed that 4 and 6 days post-infection (dpi) increased numbers of Iba-1 + cells were present in the OB (XREF_FIG A).
evidence: Iba-1, a common marker for microglia and infiltrating monocytes, revealed that 4 and 6 days post-infection (dpi) increased numbers of Iba-1 +  cells were present in the OB
